decks.notes: The key strategy of this UW Control deck is to maintain control of the board through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while drawing into powerful spells like Supreme Verdict and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria to ultimately win the game. The inclusion of Kaheera as a companion allows for additional synergy and value, adding to the deck's overall game plan of outlasting and outmaneuvering the opponent. The deck focuses on controlling the game tempo and securing victory through efficient use of resources and powerful control elements.

The deck focuses on using Niv-Mizzet Reborn as a powerful control piece, supported by a versatile array of cards across all five colors. It aims to control the battlefield with removal spells like Vanishing Verse and Maelstrom Pulse, while generating card advantage and ramping with cards like Bring to Light and Up the Beanstalk. The inclusion of Leyline Binding provides additional control elements, while powerful threats like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Niv-Mizzet, Parun can quickly close out the game. The deck's versatility and powerful threats make it a formidable force in the Pioneer format.

The deck focuses on quickly building up an aggressive board presence with low-cost creatures and efficient combat tricks to deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible. The inclusion of Jegantha as a companion adds consistency to the deck by providing an extra mana source. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with hasty creatures and pump spells, while also utilizing the mana acceleration from the lands to keep up the pressure. The deck aims to win the game before the opponent can establish a defense or stabilize the board.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on utilizing creatures with low mana cost and aggressive abilities to overwhelm opponents quickly. It also makes use of burn spells to deal direct damage to the opponent or to remove opposing threats. The deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish the game as fast as possible, utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Kumano Faces Kakkazan, and Heartfire Hero to deal damage efficiently. Additionally, the inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional value and flexibility to the deck.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive artifact creatures and enchanting them with Ensoul Artifact to create powerful threats early in the game. It also includes spells and abilities to protect and enhance these artifacts, while utilizing cards like Spyglass Siren and Smuggler's Copter to maintain card advantage and pressure the opponent. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion allows for additional mana acceleration and flexibility in casting spells. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and evasive artifact-based aggro strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad to maximize value through blinking creatures and enchantments with powerful abilities. By using cards like Zur, Eternal Schemer and Leyline Binding, the deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes a variety of powerful creatures like Overlord of the Mistmoors and Overlord of the Hauntwoods to apply pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of removal spells like Vanishing Verse and Fatal Push to deal with opposing threats.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures and powerful synergies like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Thalia's Lieutenant. The deck aims to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent early on, using cards like Adeline, Resplendent Cathar and Coppercoat Vanguard for damage while protecting key creatures with cards like Brave the Elements and Dauntless Bodyguard. The deck also includes some disruption with Declaration in Stone and Extraction Specialist to handle opposing threats and maintain tempo.
